00101 #if LIBRDKAFKA_TYPECHECKS
00102 #define _LRK_TYPECHECK(RET,TYPE,ARG)                    \
00103         ({ if (0) { TYPE __t RD_UNUSED = (ARG); } RET; })
00104 
00105 #define _LRK_TYPECHECK2(RET,TYPE,ARG,TYPE2,ARG2)        \
00106         ({                                              \
00107                 if (0) {                                \
00108                         TYPE __t RD_UNUSED = (ARG);     \
00109                         TYPE2 __t2 RD_UNUSED = (ARG2);  \
00110                 }                                       \
00111                 RET; })
00112 
00113 #define _LRK_TYPECHECK3(RET,TYPE,ARG,TYPE2,ARG2,TYPE3,ARG3) \
00114         ({                                              \
00115                 if (0) {                                \
00116                         TYPE __t RD_UNUSED = (ARG);     \
00117                         TYPE2 __t2 RD_UNUSED = (ARG2);  \
00118                         TYPE3 __t3 RD_UNUSED = (ARG3);  \
00119                 }                                       \
00120                 RET; })
00121 #else
00122 #define _LRK_TYPECHECK(RET,TYPE,ARG)  (RET)
00123 #define _LRK_TYPECHECK2(RET,TYPE,ARG,TYPE2,ARG2) (RET)
00124 #define _LRK_TYPECHECK3(RET,TYPE,ARG,TYPE2,ARG2,TYPE3,ARG3) (RET)
00125 #endif

00795 typedef enum rd_kafka_vtype_t {
00796         RD_KAFKA_VTYPE_END,       
00797         RD_KAFKA_VTYPE_TOPIC,     
00798         RD_KAFKA_VTYPE_RKT,       
00799         RD_KAFKA_VTYPE_PARTITION, 
00800         RD_KAFKA_VTYPE_VALUE,     
00801         RD_KAFKA_VTYPE_KEY,       
00802         RD_KAFKA_VTYPE_OPAQUE,    
00803         RD_KAFKA_VTYPE_MSGFLAGS,  
00804         RD_KAFKA_VTYPE_TIMESTAMP, 
00805         RD_KAFKA_VTYPE_HEADER,    
00807         RD_KAFKA_VTYPE_HEADERS,   
00808 } rd_kafka_vtype_t;
00809 
00810 
00819 #define RD_KAFKA_V_END RD_KAFKA_VTYPE_END
00820 
00824 #define RD_KAFKA_V_TOPIC(topic)                                         \
00825         _LRK_TYPECHECK(RD_KAFKA_VTYPE_TOPIC, const char *, topic),      \
00826         (const char *)topic
00827 
00830 #define RD_KAFKA_V_RKT(rkt)                                             \
00831         _LRK_TYPECHECK(RD_KAFKA_VTYPE_RKT, rd_kafka_topic_t *, rkt),    \
00832         (rd_kafka_topic_t *)rkt
00833 
00836 #define RD_KAFKA_V_PARTITION(partition)                                 \
00837         _LRK_TYPECHECK(RD_KAFKA_VTYPE_PARTITION, int32_t, partition),   \
00838         (int32_t)partition
00839 
00842 #define RD_KAFKA_V_VALUE(VALUE,LEN)                                     \
00843         _LRK_TYPECHECK2(RD_KAFKA_VTYPE_VALUE, void *, VALUE, size_t, LEN), \
00844         (void *)VALUE, (size_t)LEN
00845 
00848 #define RD_KAFKA_V_KEY(KEY,LEN)                                         \
00849         _LRK_TYPECHECK2(RD_KAFKA_VTYPE_KEY, const void *, KEY, size_t, LEN), \
00850         (void *)KEY, (size_t)LEN
00851 
00855 #define RD_KAFKA_V_OPAQUE(opaque)                                 \
00856         _LRK_TYPECHECK(RD_KAFKA_VTYPE_OPAQUE, void *, opaque),    \
00857         (void *)opaque
00858 
00862 #define RD_KAFKA_V_MSGFLAGS(msgflags)                                 \
00863         _LRK_TYPECHECK(RD_KAFKA_VTYPE_MSGFLAGS, int, msgflags),       \
00864         (int)msgflags
00865 
00868 #define RD_KAFKA_V_TIMESTAMP(timestamp)                                 \
00869         _LRK_TYPECHECK(RD_KAFKA_VTYPE_TIMESTAMP, int64_t, timestamp),   \
00870         (int64_t)timestamp
00871 
00877 #define RD_KAFKA_V_HEADER(NAME,VALUE,LEN)                               \
00878         _LRK_TYPECHECK3(RD_KAFKA_VTYPE_HEADER, const char *, NAME,      \
00879                         const void *, VALUE, ssize_t, LEN),             \
00880                 (const char *)NAME, (const void *)VALUE, (ssize_t)LEN
00881 
00891 #define RD_KAFKA_V_HEADERS(HDRS)                                        \
00892         _LRK_TYPECHECK(RD_KAFKA_VTYPE_HEADERS, rd_kafka_headers_t *, HDRS), \
00893                 (rd_kafka_headers_t *)HDRS
00894

01037 // FIXME: This doesn't show up in docs for some reason

01053 typedef struct rd_kafka_message_s {
01054     rd_kafka_resp_err_t err;   
01055     rd_kafka_topic_t *rkt;     
01056     int32_t partition;         
01057     void   *payload;           
01061     size_t  len;               
01064     void   *key;               
01066     size_t  key_len;           
01068     int64_t offset;            
01078     void  *_private;           
01082 } rd_kafka_message_t;
01083 
01084 
01088 RD_EXPORT
01089 void rd_kafka_message_destroy(rd_kafka_message_t *rkmessage);
01090 
01091 
01092 
01093 
01100 static RD_INLINE const char *
01101 RD_UNUSED 
01102 rd_kafka_message_errstr(const rd_kafka_message_t *rkmessage) {
01103     if (!rkmessage->err)
01104         return NULL;
01105 
01106     if (rkmessage->payload)
01107         return (const char *)rkmessage->payload;
01108 
01109     return rd_kafka_err2str(rkmessage->err);
01110 }
01111

01126 int64_t rd_kafka_message_timestamp (const rd_kafka_message_t *rkmessage,
01127                     rd_kafka_timestamp_type_t *tstype);

03106 typedef struct rd_kafka_metadata_broker {
03107         int32_t     id;             
03108         char       *host;           
03109         int         port;           
03110 } rd_kafka_metadata_broker_t;
03111 
03115 typedef struct rd_kafka_metadata_partition {
03116         int32_t     id;             
03117         rd_kafka_resp_err_t err;    
03118         int32_t     leader;         
03119         int         replica_cnt;    
03120         int32_t    *replicas;       
03121         int         isr_cnt;        
03122         int32_t    *isrs;           
03123 } rd_kafka_metadata_partition_t;
03124 
03128 typedef struct rd_kafka_metadata_topic {
03129         char       *topic;          
03130         int         partition_cnt;  
03131         struct rd_kafka_metadata_partition *partitions; 
03132         rd_kafka_resp_err_t err;    
03133 } rd_kafka_metadata_topic_t;
03134 
03135 
03139 typedef struct rd_kafka_metadata {
03140         int         broker_cnt;     
03141         struct rd_kafka_metadata_broker *brokers;  
03143         int         topic_cnt;      
03144         struct rd_kafka_metadata_topic *topics;    
03146         int32_t     orig_broker_id;   
03147         char       *orig_broker_name; 
03148 } rd_kafka_metadata_t;
03149 
03150

03200 struct rd_kafka_group_member_info {
03201         char *member_id;            
03202         char *client_id;            
03203         char *client_host;          
03204         void *member_metadata;      
03206         int   member_metadata_size; 
03207         void *member_assignment;    
03209         int   member_assignment_size; 
03210 };
03211 
03215 struct rd_kafka_group_info {
03216         struct rd_kafka_metadata_broker broker; 
03217         char *group;                            
03218         rd_kafka_resp_err_t err;                
03219         char *state;                            
03220         char *protocol_type;                    
03221         char *protocol;                         
03222         struct rd_kafka_group_member_info *members; 
03223         int   member_cnt;                       
03224 };
03225

03233         int    group_cnt;                     
03234 };

03462 typedef int rd_kafka_event_type_t;
03463 #define RD_KAFKA_EVENT_NONE          0x0
03464 #define RD_KAFKA_EVENT_DR            0x1  
03465 #define RD_KAFKA_EVENT_FETCH         0x2  
03466 #define RD_KAFKA_EVENT_LOG           0x4  
03467 #define RD_KAFKA_EVENT_ERROR         0x8  
03468 #define RD_KAFKA_EVENT_REBALANCE     0x10 
03469 #define RD_KAFKA_EVENT_OFFSET_COMMIT 0x20 
03470 #define RD_KAFKA_EVENT_STATS         0x40
